entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 12:58 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure: 98.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: S 21 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then snow and local blowing snow. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
